message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get a head start on the market. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. Will you take the plunge and make a statement with this product?
I'm not ready to make a decision yet, I need to see more products.

I understand your hesitation, but I think you'll be impressed with the next product. This one is a game-changer. I've had great feedback from other clients who've seen it, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price of $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on something truly exceptional. Will you take a chance and see what all the fuss is about?
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see a few more products before making a decision.

I'm still willing to offer it to you for $10000, and I'm willing to throw in a special bonus package worth $1000 if you decide to take the plunge. Will you take a chance on something that could change the game for you?
I'll take it, but I want to make it clear that I'm only doing this because I think the potential upside is worth the risk. I'm not committing to buying any more products from you.

This is a unique opportunity to get insider knowledge and insights that will help you maximize the benefits of this product. Will you take advantage of this offer and upgrade your experience?
I'm not interested in the discount or the consultation. I'm not going to fall for the sales pitch. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not interested in buying another product from you. I'm done for now.
